The highest score here is 13 - 0. So the maximum points scored in a match are indeed 13. 

Next, I need to check if that game was a shutout. A shutout occurs when the opposing team scores zero goals. In this case, the score is 13 - 0, so yes, it's a shutout because the opponent didn't score any goals.

Wait, but let me make sure that there isn't another match with a higher score or another 13-0. Looking through all the scores, the next highest after 13 is 3 - 0 and others are lower, so 13 is the maximum. And only one row has 13 - 0.

So both conditions of the claim are satisfied: the highest score is 13, and that game was a shutout (opponent scored zero). Therefore, the claim should be TRUE.
